== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Sum;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2211/index.htm U+02211].
  * `&sum;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2211/index.htm U+02211].
